code: export var DEFAULT_COLOR='indigo-600';export var GRASS_GREEN='green-600';export var RED_DANGER='red-500';export var BRIGHT_PINK='pink-600';export var SWEET_PURPLE='purple-500';export var BRIGHT_YELLOW='yellow-400';export var SKY_BLUE='blue-500';export var ALL_COLORS=Object.freeze([DEFAULT_COLOR,GRASS_GREEN,RED_DANGER,BRIGHT_PINK,SWEET_PURPLE,BRIGHT_YELLOW,SKY_BLUE]);export function getBackgroundColor(color){return"bg-".concat(color);}export function getTextColor(color){return"text-".concat(color);}
